app.name: AI Trust & Security Maturity Framework
app.subtitle: A Cybersecurity Maturity Assessment for AI
app.title: AI-First Software Engineering Maturity Assessment
app.meta_description: Transform your software engineering with AI-first maturity assessment. Get actionable insights and personalized roadmaps for your organization's AI journey.

home.hero_subtitle: Evaluate your AI-driven applications' trustworthiness and security posture across key dimensions including ethical AI practices, data privacy, robustness, and compliance, all based on market frameworks such as OWASP AIMA, NIST AI RMF and MITRE ATLAS. Obtain a comprehensive final report with potential risks and insights to build a secure-driven roadmap for AI-first applications.

about.page_title: About - AI-First Software Engineering Maturity Assessment
about.hero_title: About the AI Trust & Security Maturity Assessment
about.hero_desc: Empowering organizations worldwide to securely navigate their AI transformation journey through a comprehensive maturity assessment. Gain insights into your current AI trust and security posture, using industry best practices, guidances and standards to identify gaps and opportunities for improvement. Receive a detailed report highlighting potential risks to build a secure-driven roadmap for AI-first applications.
about.purpose_desc: This assessment helps organizations understand, measure, and manage their maturity in the use of Artificial Intelligence from a trust, security, risk, and governance perspective.
about.purpose_detail: Rather than focusing solely on technical performance, the assessment evaluates AI systems as socio-technical systems, where risks emerge from the interaction between:
about.purpose_goal: The primary goal is to enable organizations to identify material AI risks early, understand root causes, and prioritize practical improvements aligned with frameworks such as OWASP AIMA, NIST AI RMF, and MITRE ATLAS.
about.mission_desc: This project has the goal to democratize AI-first and secure software engineering by providing organizations with comprehensive assessment tools, actionable insights, and rich resources that accelerate their digital transformation and competitive advantage.
about.vision_desc: The vision is to move organizations from reactive, compliance-driven AI practices toward proactive, risk-informed, and maturity-driven AI governance.
about.vision_1: AI risks are anticipated rather than discovered after incidents.
about.vision_2: Ethical, legal, and security considerations are embedded into business and operational processes.
about.vision_3: Decision-making is supported by evidence, metrics, and continuous monitoring.
about.vision_4: AI systems remain trustworthy, secure, and aligned with organizational values throughout their lifecycle.
about.is_1: A maturity-based diagnostic tool, not a pass/fail audit
about.is_2: A risk-oriented framework, not a checklist
about.is_3: A way to surface hidden or emerging AI risks (incl. governance)
about.is_4: A foundation for prioritized, roadmap-driven improvement
about.is_not_3: A purely technical evaluation of model performance
about.is_not_4: A substitute for technical audits or penetration testing
about.framework_desc: Comprehensive evaluation across 7 critical dimensions of AI-driven systems maturity.
about.fc_desc: Core building blocks including AI infrastructure & tooling, team AI literacy & skills, code generation & review, and documentation & knowledge management.
about.tc_desc: Advanced capabilities including intent-to-architecture translation, AI-driven testing, intelligent CI/CD, monitoring & observability, and legacy system modernization.
about.ei_desc: Enterprise-scale capabilities including data governance, vendor standardization, system integration, cost management, performance & scalability, and business continuity.
about.sg_desc: Leadership frameworks including AI ethics, regulatory compliance, IP management, risk management, change management, performance measurement, collaboration, and innovation.
about.benefits_desc: Transform software engineering practices with comprehensive AI-first maturity insights.
about.benefit_gaps_desc: Identify high-risk gaps in AI governance, security, ethics, deployment, and operations.
about.benefit_stand_desc: Understand how organizational maturity influences AI risk exposure.
about.benefit_bench_desc: Get your results from industry standards and identify areas for competitive advantage.
about.benefit_risks_desc: Prioritize remediation based on risk severity and maturity level. Create shared understanding of AI risk across stakeholders
about.benefit_security_desc: Insights to deploy, pause, redesign, or decommission AI systems safely.
about.benefit_responsibility_desc: A tool you can use to demonstrate due diligence to regulators and auditors.
about.cta_title: Ready to Assess Your AI-First Maturity?
about.cta_desc: Evaluate your organization's AI-driven development capabilities across foundational, transformation, enterprise, and governance dimensions. Get your AFS Score and actionable roadmap.

maturity.title: Maturity Levels
maturity.desc: The maturity model reflects how consistently and effectively AI-related practices are implemented across the organization. Each area is evaluated across five maturity levels:
maturity.report_desc: Each area is evaluated across five maturity levels that reflect how consistently and effectively AI-related practices are implemented:
maturity.informal_desc: Ad-hoc level. Practices are reactive and inconsistent; risks often addressed after incidents.
maturity.defined_desc: Basic controls exist; practices depend heavily on individuals.
maturity.systematic_desc: Systematic AI integration across development workflows. Processes are documented, standardized, and repeatable; risk, ethics, and security are embedded.
maturity.integrated_desc: Practices are measured; decisions informed by data, monitoring, and trends.
maturity.optimized_desc: Continuous improvement; lessons and emerging risks are systematically incorporated.

assessment.title: Assessments
assessment.create_subtitle: Start a new assessment to evaluate your organization's AI maturity
assessment.draft_desc: This assessment is ready to begin. Start answering questions to evaluate your AI maturity.
assessment.completed_desc: This assessment is complete! View your results and recommendations below.
assessment.not_found_desc: The requested assessment could not be found.

complete_page.ready_desc: You've answered enough questions to generate meaningful results.
complete_page.ready_detail: Completing this assessment will calculate your AFS score, determine your AI maturity level, and generate personalized recommendations for improvement.
complete_page.more_needed_desc: Complete at least 80% of questions to generate reliable results.
complete_page.more_needed_detail: You can still complete the assessment with current progress, but results may be less accurate.

org_info.title: Organization Information
org_info.about_desc: This assessment evaluates your organization's AI maturity across multiple dimensions.

create.intro_desc: This assessment contains 7 major domains, with 18 areas through it, all with binary questions. Each positive answer increases the score until a max of 5. You may select which domains and areas you want to assess.
create.saved_locally: Selections and answers are saved locally in your browser

report.title: Assessment Report
report.section_performance_desc: Percentage score breakdown by assessment section. Each segment represents a section's performance.
report.maturity_distribution_desc: How sections are distributed across maturity levels. Numbers show sections at each level.
report.no_gaps: No gaps identified â€” all items confirmed
report.no_roadmap: No roadmap data available for this assessment.
report.no_roadmap_desc: Complete more assessment questions to generate a personalized roadmap for your AI-First maturity journey.
report.area_maturity_overview_desc: This report describes the current assessed state: levels, answers, gaps, and risks.
report.area_level_maturity_desc: Area-level maturity based on assessed current level
report.section_maturity_breakdown_desc: Which specific sections achieved each maturity level:

question_page.title: Assessment Question
question_page.comments_placeholder: Share any additional context or thoughts about this question...
question_page.tip_1: Answer based on your current organizational state, not aspirational goals
question_page.tip_2: Consider the majority of your teams/projects, not just the most advanced
question_page.tip_3: Use the additional comments to provide context or clarification
question_page.tip_4: You can save your progress and return later if needed

section_questions.answer_instruction: Answer all questions in this section based on your current organizational state
section_questions.view_guidance: View maturity guidance for this area
section_questions.questions_coming: Questions for this area will be added soon.
section_questions.optional_note: All questions are optional, but we recommend answering as many as possible for accurate results
section_questions.no_pitfall: No specific pitfall identified for this level.
section_questions.notes_placeholder: Add any additional context or clarification...

final_review.title: Final Review
final_review.subtitle: Review your responses before generating your maturity assessment report

final_review.generating_desc: This may take a few moments while we analyze your responses and calculate your maturity scores.
